RequirementsÂ¶

For the program to run the following packages and software needs to be installed on the computer. When using the installer these are automatically isntalled.

  • Anaconda 5.3.1
  • Xlsxwriter
  • Pyqt
  • Sphinx_rtd_theme
  • Winshell
